criterias.normal: same criteria as for Misty Flip and SAT + flow and speed of transition
criterias.twisted: must be twisted during the entry, untwisted by the rotation of the Misty flip
criterias.devil twist: twisted during the entry, untwisted by the spinning of the glider and twisted to the opposite direction, then connected to a twisted SAT. (FYI for this manoeuvre the pilot then has 3/4 twists during the SAT)
criterias.full twisted: must stay twisted during the rotation of the Misty Flip, keep the twist during the exit and stay twisted during the SAT until the exit
criterias.to_twisted_sat: Misty to Twisted SAT: normal (not twisted) Misty Flip, twisted during the end of the rotation of the misty connected into a twisted SAT
